rows.label: qst700701_msg0201
rows.name:
Oh, Adel-sama! I've been
wanting to see you!!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0202
rows.name: Excuse me, I have some business.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0203
rows.name: Please wait!!!!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0204
rows.name:
That's too cruel! You don't
understand how much I worry
about you, Adel-sama! Not at all!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0205
rows.name:
It's truly, truly regrettable!! I've
sworn such loyalty to our country Iira
and to you, Adel-sama, and yet you...

rows.label: qst700701_msg0206
rows.name:
...In the first place, I have watched over you
more closely than anyone since your childhood,
and you were always a bit too free-spirited...

rows.label: qst700701_msg0207
rows.name:
Your... sto... ry...
is... too... loooong!!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0208
rows.name:
Hahaha... Let's hear
your request for now.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0209
rows.name: Ah, yes.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0210
rows.name:
The recent attack has caused damage
all over the capital, and while we
are working to clear the rubble,

rows.label: qst700701_msg0211
rows.name:
the response in the residential and shopping
districts is particularly slow, and we are
short-handed. We need to find a way...

rows.label: qst700701_msg0212
rows.name:
I see, I see. So... Would it
be a problem if we helped?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0213
rows.name: What! Is that all right?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0214
rows.name:
You're short-handed, right? You'd
even want a prince's help, let
alone a cat's paw, wouldn't you?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0215
rows.name:
She's right. Please
let me help as well.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0216
rows.name: That would be a great help... hmm?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0217
rows.name: Ah, you must be from Superbia!?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0218
rows.name: Shh, I'm trying to be incognito here.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0219
rows.name:
With this many hands, we
should be done in no time.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0220
rows.name:
Clearing the rubble from the
residential and shopping districts,
was it? Let's get started at once.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0221
rows.name: Awa-wa-wa-wa--
